scripts.build: bun --filter @linode/validation build && bun --filter @linode/api-v4 build && bun run --filter linode-manager build
scripts.up: bun install:all && bun build:validation && bun build:sdk && bun start:all
scripts.up:expose: bun install:all && bun build:validation && bun build:sdk && bun start:all:expose
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n api-v4,validation,ui,manager -c blue,yellow,magenta,green "bun run --filter @linode/api-v4 start" "bun run --filter @linode/validation start" "bun run --filter @linode/ui start" "bun run --filter linode-manager start"
scripts.start:all:expose: concurrently -n api-v4,validation,ui,manager -c blue,yellow,magenta,green "bun run --filter @linode/api-v4 start" "bun run --filter @linode/validation start" "bun run --filter @linode/ui start" "bun run --filter linode-manager start:expose"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/@linode/api-v4/node_modules && rm -rf packages/manager/node_modules && rm -rf packages/@linode/validation/node_modules
